analysis.description:
ECToken.purchase (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#213-251) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#246)

ECToken._payout (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#398-403) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#400-401)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#401-403)

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0xbdcf9da780448d62b741ce7a68877c7aad41e4b5.sol#16-18)
